confirmation_page.confirm: Confirm your data to write it to the cloud.

error_page.import_error: An error occurred during the import.

message.before_error: The file could not be imported due to the following problems:
message.retry_after_error: Check the file syntax and try again.

errors.end_time_before_start_time: End time must not be before start time.
errors.excessive_data: More than one year of data is not supported.
errors.file_too_large: The file you tried to upload is too large. The maximum size is 7MB.
errors.invalid_duration_cdr: The contact was claimed to be handled but has no duration.
errors.invalid_end_of_line: Use consistent end of line characters in one file.
errors.invalid_handled_cdr: The handled field must contain either 0 or 1.
errors.invalid_number: Check the formats of the numeric values.
errors.invalid_row_length: The number of fields in this line doesn't match the number of fields in the header row.
errors.invalid_time_range: The data exceeds the maximum period of 10 years.
errors.invalid_timestamp: Invalid timestamp according to the interval length.
errors.non_existing_timestamp: The specified local time does not represent an existing timestamp.

active_description.invalid: Drop only one file with a CSV format.

description.multiple: Drag CSV files here to add them.
description.single: Drag one CSV file (.csv or .txt) here to add it

file_input.file_limit_warning: You can upload the file by clicking on "Import file".

upload_form.introduction: Import one CSV file of your historical data from your ACD to create a forecast in injixo. The maximum size of the CSV file must not exceed 7MB.
upload_form.invalid_file: The file '{{file_name}}' could not be selected. Provide a valid CSV file.
upload_form.multi_upload_warning: Uploading data from multiple browser windows or computers at the same time may damage your existing queue data.

no_integration.text: In order to import CSV data, you first need to create a CSV integration.

writing_page.writing: Please wait a moment while your data is written into the cloud...
writing_page.writing_status: Writing your data to the cloud...
